st:Description.name: NCMfgOperation
st:Description.st:role: Lists the settings of the operations used in the Machining applications
st:Description.st:detailedRole: The operation machining settings are useful to manages options on manufacturing operations

st:attribute.Name: UseBlockInit
st:attribute.st:role: Use default values of the current program
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Use default values of the current program

st:attribute.Name: AutoEditOper
st:attribute.st:role: Start Edit Mode (Not Available for MP)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Start Edit Mode (Not Available for MP)

st:attribute.Name: DisplayTPOnMO
st:attribute.st:role: Display toolpath of operation in current Part-Operation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Display toolpath of operation in current Part-Operation

st:attribute.Name: ReverseKeyWord
st:attribute.st:role: Specify a word which will be appended at the end of an MO after Reverse Machining

st:attribute.Name: SearchToolInProgram
st:attribute.st:role: Search compatible tool in previous program
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Search compatible tool in previous program

st:attribute.Name: ContinueTPOnError
st:attribute.st:role: Disable invalid MOs and continue tool path compuation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Disable invalid MOs and continue tool path compuation

st:attribute.Name: MPInstant_TLAbsPos
st:attribute.st:role: Keep absolute position of tool axis and machining direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Keep absolute position of tool axis and machining direction
